means: （尤指某些宗教中神的名字）因神圣而不容称呼的

sentence.Network_en: The beauty of a sunset is ineffable.
sentence.Network_cn: 日落的美是难以形容的.

sentence.Network_en: The terror had at long intervals given place to a feeling of an almost ineffable sweetness.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种胆战心惊的感觉就偶尔让位给一种简直说不出的甜蜜的感觉了.

sentence.Network_en: They threw this eager vitality of theirs into a vehement striving after the ineffable.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们把他们的这种热烈的精力都投入了对一种无法表达的事物的强烈追求.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 蓝宝GRE笔考词汇突破核心词汇 - 免费文档下载 ... testy 暴躁的 ineffable 不能说的 an affable smile. 慈祥的微笑.
莫若_百度百科 ... 莫讲〖 letalone〗 莫名〖 ineffable;unexplainable〗 莫斯科〖 Moscow〗.
GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... industrious 勤劳的，勤勉的 ineffable 妙不可言的 ineffectual 无效的，徒劳无益的.
GRE易混词汇 - 小马过河 ... inaffable a. 不和蔼的 ineffable a. 妙不可言的;避讳的 ineffaceable a. 抹不掉的,无法取消的.

list.abs: How is midnight baby always ineffable Jing cries to do ? What should notice ?, 半夜婴儿总是莫名的惊哭怎么办 ? 应该注意些什么?
3 after waking time , psychology always has an ineffable fear , is lose sentimental ?, 三次了每次醒了之后心理总有一丝莫名的恐惧 , 失落伤感?
ineffable joy , beauty , etc., 难以形容的喜悦 , 美丽等.
not forgetting something that is probably quite ineffable ., 不要忘记那些可能是难以言喻的东西.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, or from Latin ineffabilis, from in- 'not' + effabilis (see effable)

entry.tran: 言语难以表达的;不可言喻的
entry.def: You use ineffable to say that something is so great or extreme that it cannot be described in words.

example.ex: ...the ineffable sadness of many of the portraits.
example.tran: 许多肖像流露出的难以形容的悲伤

auth_sentence.content: Many tracks here seem rooted in an ineffable sadness.
auth_sentence.res_content: Many tracks here seem rooted in an ineffable sadness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Many tracks here seem rooted in an ineffable sadness.

auth_sentence.content: Domestic tragedy, like domestic happiness, is ineffable.
auth_sentence.res_content: Domestic tragedy, like domestic happiness, is ineffable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Domestic tragedy, like domestic happiness, is ineffable.

auth_sentence.content: I could see the ineffable way they looked at me.
auth_sentence.res_content: I could see the ineffable way they looked at me.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I could see the ineffable way they looked at me.

stems_affixes.word_buile: af接近+fable=fabl说话→不断可以说话→亲切

stems_affixes.value_cn: 能被说出的, 可表达的

stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+effable[adj.能被说出的, 可表达的]→adj.妙不可言的,说不出的

means.word_mean: 妙不可言的, 不可言喻的

sentences.en: The beauty of a sunset is ineffable.
sentences.cn: 日落的美是难以形容的。
